dict.string: We need access to your photo library to [insert purpose here], allowing you to [mention specific functionality, e.g., upload, share, or edit photos]. Rest assured, we respect your privacy and will only access the photos required for these features.

To enhance your experience, we request access to your camera. This enables you to [mention specific functionality, e.g., capture moments, scan documents, or use augmented reality features]. We value your privacy and will only use the camera for these purposes.

If you plan to record videos, we need access to your microphone. This allows you to [mention specific functionality, e.g., record and share videos]. Your privacy is important to us, and we assure you that the microphone will only be used for these specified purposes.
